project.ss.voice
Class VoiceBuilder

java.lang.Object
  project.ss.voice.VoiceBuilder
public class VoiceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a utility class. The class provides only one method which can build the Voice File and Voice Info file.

Method Detail

buildVoice

public static void buildVoice(java.io.File directory,
                              java.lang.String filename)
This method concatenates the different audio file into a single file known as Voice File. It also provides the position of the audio and audio length into Voice Info File. The name of the Voice File and Voice Info File are given as second argument in method. The first argument provides directory where all the sound files are

Parameters:
directory -
filename -
